name: pawn-painter
description: Colour picker for open.mp and SA-MP

pawnpainter.general.enableColorPicker.description: Enable the VS Code color picker for all supported color formats. This allows you to use the built-in color picker to modify colors in your code.

pawnpainter.hex.enabled.description: Enable highlighting for hexadecimal color codes (0xRRGGBB, 0xRRGGBBAA, {RRGGBB}).

enumDescriptions: Color the text directly with the specified color
Show a colored underline below the hex color code
Show a colored background behind the hex color code
pawnpainter.hex.style.description: Choose how hex color codes should be highlighted in your code

pawnpainter.hex.showAlphaWarnings.description: Show warning hints when a color has an alpha value of 00. This can help identify potentially unintended transparent colors.

pawnpainter.gameText.enabled.description: Enable color preview for GameText color codes (~r~, ~g~, ~b~, etc.). Supports brightness modifiers (~h~) for enhanced colors.

enumDescriptions: Color the text directly with the specified color
Show a colored underline below the text
Show a colored background behind the text
pawnpainter.gameText.style.description: Choose how GameText colors should be displayed in your code

pawnpainter.inlineText.enabled.description: Enable color highlighting for text between color tags (e.g., '{FF0000}red text, {FFFFFF}white text'). This helps visualize colored text.

enumDescriptions: Color the text directly with the specified color
Show a colored underline below the text
Show a colored background behind the text
pawnpainter.inlineText.style.description: Choose how inline colored text should be displayed in your code
